title: The Nereid
description: "a burgeoning young adult urban-fantasy series about true love, evolution and the end of the world..."  Buried within the Antarctic ice an ancient malice wakes.  On an isolated coast in the southern seas a young man slowly drowns.  And deep beneath the ocean the Heir to the throne makes a choice that will shatter three realms.  Plunged into a dark, cold world where celestial beings and monsters battle to tear the world apart, Luis Green must face the truth of who, or rather what, he is. If he doesn't the world will belong to the Angels.
author: Carla Munro
